improvement: Evaluation mode: using predetermined tool configuration
description: Unlock the power of multilingual language detection with API Ninjas Text Language API endpoint. This cutting-edge endpoint supports over 100 languages, including Arabic, Hebrew, Spanish, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, Dutch, Russian, Chinese, Japanese, Korean, and many more. With its unparalleled speed and accuracy, it can effortlessly handle even the most complex texts, making it an ideal choice for demanding applications. From English to non-English languages, API Ninjas Text Language API endpoint is the go-to solution for language detection tasks. Our advanced algorithms ensure that you get accurate results every time, even with texts containing special characters or mixed languages.
name: multilanguage_language_detection_ninjas_api_v3
